about_the_game:
Even the abandons consider Smuggler dangerous and try to avoid them.
These folks are the scariest and most dangerous being among Avengers.
Smuggler cover their face with white skull mask.
In the dark , armed with bows and swords , they quietly wait for the prey to come .

-Hiding
disappears without a trace

-Landmines
Deploy landmines

-Lure
deploy a dummy to lure enemy ,and the dummy will explode

after you brought this DLC , you can receive unlock items at 邮筒-保管函

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7 64bit以上
  • Processor: Intel i3或同级别其他型号
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 显存 512M以上
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
